docs.text:
This project is currently in early development and is still not usable


markdowndotnet
¶


Python command line tool to generate markdown documents from C# Library files and their XML documentation.


Requirements
¶




Python 3.6 or higher


pythonnet


PyYAML


click




The generated files markdown files are meant to be used with 
mkdocs
 
(with the 
material theme
), but may be compatible with other site generators.


Features
¶




Generates markdown documents from a compiled binary (dll) and it's documentation file.


Displays all public fields, properties and methods, along with their parameters and return types.




Planned features
¶




Generate internal links between members


External links to system classes

docs.text:
Enum ChannelTypes
¶


Represents the different channel types available.








Field


Description










GUILD_TEXT


Text channel in a guild.






DM


Private channel between two users.






GUILD_VOICE


Voice channel in a guild.






GROUP_DM


Private group channel.






GUILD_CATEGORY


Channel category in a guild.
